channel.title: Data-viz on Sarah Romanes
channel.description: Recent content in Data-viz on Sarah Romanes

item.title: An argument for eating that pizza whilst on vacation - exploring the sugrrants package
item.description: Ah, back to reality! Last month, I was fortunate enough to be able to travel away from the cold Sydney winter over to Central and North America for a holiday and also to present my work on multiDA at JSM in Vancouver. Whilst at JSM, I was able to hear Earo present her work (along with Di and Rob) on making calendar plots in R, using data from pedestrian traffic in Melbourne (see more here).
